Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Syn-enterocin-64 (AS-48 minimal domain analog, synthetic AMPs, Lys-rich, UCLL1)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, sequence shuffling, bacteria-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (58.62%) toSyn-enterocin-1K: 28%, A: 16%, I: 12%.Activity: exhibits leishmanicidal activity against L. donovani (IC50 0.42 uM).Toxicity: THP-1 cells (CC50 < 20 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Corman HN, Ross JN, Fields FR, Shoue DA, McDowell MA, Lee SW.2022
Literature Information.Title: Rationally Designed Minimal Bioactive Domains of AS-48 Bacteriocin Homologs Possess Potent Antileishmanial Properties.
